alert.note: Alert for Frederick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:25PM EDT until July 12 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR CENTRAL ALLEGANY COUNTY IN WESTERN MARYLAND...NORTHWESTERN FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN VIRGINIA...WEST CENTRAL MORGAN COUNTY IN THE PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA...EAST CENTRAL MINERAL AND NORTHERN HAMPSHIRE COUNTIES IN EASTERN WEST VIRGINIA IS CANCELLED... The storms which prompted the warning have weakened below severe limits, and no longer pose an immediate threat to life or property. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However gusty winds and heavy rain are still possible with these thunderstorms. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for western Maryland...northwestern Virginia...and eastern and the Panhandle of West Virginia. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Sterling Virginia.
